body_html:
Its difficult to decipher why you aren't observing gain in speed. Some general guidelines to solve your issues:
You can try adding dropout layer to reduce sparsity.
I wouldn't recommend removing conv layer since dropout should help in regularization.
Also I would like to recommend referring this research paper
It talks about how to design a network that balances its size, training time, and prediction accuracy.

body:
Its difficult to decipher why you aren't observing gain in speed. Some general guidelines to solve your issues:
You can try adding dropout layer to reduce sparsity.
I wouldn't recommend removing conv layer since dropout should help in regularization.
Also I would like to recommend referring this [research paper](https://openreview.net/pdf?id=SkC_7v5gx)
It talks about how to design a network that balances its size, training time, and prediction accuracy.
